# POLARBEAR-1 First Data Release
# The POLARBEAR Collaboration, A Measurement of the Cosmic Microwave Background B-Mode Polarization Power Spectrum at Sub-Degree Scales with POLARBEAR
#
# File: POLARBEAR_First_Data_Release_Band_Power_Window_Function_2014-04-03.txt
# Date: 2014-04-03
# Patch: RA23
# 
# POLARBEAR band power window function
# This text file contains the POLARBEAR band power window function of BB for RA23.
# Each black separated by double empty lines corresponds to 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th bin of the band power window function, respectively
# They correspond to Figure 8 in the paper.
# Details on the estimation are described in Sec.5.
#
# Columns: ell BB
